title: LOVECRAFT COUNTRY Episode 1 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: I don’t feel like your explanation of "Sundown County" was sufficient. They were never under threat of arrest. They were under threat of lynching. Its important to emphasize that the racists in this story are more terrifying than the actual monsters.
They weren't stranded because the bus broke down.  They were stranded because of racism.  The guy with the pick up truck wouldn't allow them to get on with the white passengers.
This breakdown is pretty sugar coated. You know the sheriff wasn't going to "arrest" them if they weren't out by sundown.
The show has Jordan Peel and JJ Abrams but it’s predominantly Misha Green’s. And please don’t tread lightly over the racial aspects of the show. The racists are also monsters

I usually like your breakdowns but your description of what it means to be a "sundown towns" was very generous.
Sundown towns meant if a black person was caught in town after dark they were lynched.  I wonder why you didn't say that.
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and breakdown episode 1 "Sundown" of HBO's latest series Lovecraft Country based off the book by Matt Ruff. Review, recap, and easter eggs!

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
